name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MetroBeat: A Metronome keeps you in Beat!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let musicians stay in time while rehearsing and learning during daily practise.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"MetroBeat - The Metronome That Keeps You in Perfect Rhythm/Beat"

Stay in sync with MetroBeat, the essential practice tool for musicians:

✔ Seamless tempo transitions for uninterrupted flow
✔ Customizable accent options to emphasize the downbeat
✔ Flexible beat patterns for diverse musical genres
✔ Remembers your last used BPM and BEAT for quick setup
✔ Enhances timing and rhythmic awareness
✔ Elevates your practice sessions to new levels
✔ Ideal for both seasoned musicians and beginners

MetroBeat is your reliable companion to keep you on time and in the groove. Get it now and take your practice to new heights!


- - - - ⚠️ ⚠️ ⚠️ CAUTION ⚠️ ⚠️ ⚠️ - - - - 

This Extension is developed by ONE-PERSON and TESTING is a on-going task. Although I try out my best to eliminate the bug, unexpected behaviour may still occur. Feel Free to contact the developer(me) by email if you found any ISSUE. To make this extension fit the realistic requirement of daily practise for musician, more advanced function might be updated in the future.
Thank you for your attention.
